overview: Tapio brings close to twenty years of engineering and technology experience from various software and hardware areas to the team. During his 15 years with Nokia, he has held several management positions in network infrastructure, mobile handset, and venturing organizations, where he has also been involved with multiple acquisitions in various roles. Previously, he has been working at ABB and Intergraph, focusing on CAD/CAE/CIM. Tapio is based in Tampere, Finland.

image.attribution: Tapio Siik / Nokia Growth Partners
